 2015-06442015-05-28FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActNorthwest Territories Act
SubjectGovernment of the Northwest Territories Borrowing Limit ** Increase **
PrecisOrder (a) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2012-279 of March 8, 2012 and (b) setting the maximum amount of the aggregate of all borrowings at $1.3 billion for the Government of the Northwest Territories.
